type.name: fair_collection
type.children: <entries> <entry name="Data" type="group"/> <entry name="Documents" type="group"/> <entry name="Code" type="group"/> </entries>

type.name: project_program
project_project
project_site
project_site_assessment
project_fieldnote
project_dataset
project_experiment
project_instrument
project_deployment
project_contact
project_contribution
project_surveylocation
type.wiki:
{{noheading}} +section title={{name}}
{{description wikify="true"}} ==Information==
Survey Type:{{field name="survey_type"}}
Equipment: {{field name="equipment"}}

{{image message="" width="600"}}

{{mapentry width="350" message=""}}
-section

type.name: project_organization
type.wiki:
{{noheading}} +inset
+title {{field name="short_name"}} {{name}} -title {{description wikify="true"}} ==Information==
Url:{{resource}}
Type:{{field name="organization_type"}}
Status:{{field name="status"}}
Notes: {{field name="notes"}}
{{tree prefix="==Contents==" message="" showtoggle="false"}} 		{{image src="::*" message="" width="300"}}

{{map entry="Sites" message="" width="300" suffix="Site Map"}}

{{links entry="Links" message="" prefix="==Links=="}}

{{comments prefix="==Comments==" }}

==Properties== {{properties block.show="true" block.open="false"}}

-inset
